ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have taqwa of Him who created you and the earlier creatures.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And fear Him who created you and all the earlier people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and have fear of Him Who created you and the earlier generations."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have fear of the One who has created you and the generations that lived before you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And fear Him Who created you and the earlier creations.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And have Taqwa of Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And guard against (the punishment of) Him who created you and the former nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Fear Him who created you, and the generations of the ancients.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And keep your duty unto Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Fear Him who created you and those who have gone before you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So fear Him Who created you and the former generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Be wary of Him who created you and the earlier generations.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And fear Him Who created you and (who created) the generations before (you)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fear Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Fear He who created you, and the generations of the ancient'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And fear Him who created you and the masses of old.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:184] And fear Him Who created you and the former generations’, [all] creation [before you].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And keep your duty unto) and fear (Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old) He created the people of old before you.
